privacy-policy.responsible-text: The person responsible within the meaning of data protection laws, in particular the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), is:
privacy-policy.rights-text: You can exercise the following rights at any time using the contact details provided by our data protection officer:
privacy-policy.rights-first-point: Information about your data stored by us and its processing (Article 15 GDPR),
privacy-policy.rights-second-point: Correction of incorrect personal data (Article 16 GDPR),
privacy-policy.rights-third-point: Deletion of your data stored by us (Article 17 GDPR),
privacy-policy.rights-fourth-point: Restriction of data processing if we are not yet allowed to delete your data due to legal obligations (Art. 18 GDPR),
privacy-policy.rights-fifth-point: Objection to the processing of your data by us (Art. 21 GDPR) and
privacy-policy.rights-sixth-point: Data portability, provided you have consented to data processing or have concluded a contract with us (Article 20 GDPR).
privacy-policy.rights-text-second: If you have given us your consent, you can revoke it at any time with future effect.
privacy-policy.rights-text-third: You can contact a supervisory authority at any time with a complaint, e.g. B. to the responsible supervisory authority in the federal state of your place of residence or to the authority responsible for us.

privacy-policy.headline-information: Collection of general information when you visit our website
privacy-policy.information-text-first: When you access our website, i.e. if you do not register or otherwise submit information, information of a general nature is automatically collected. This information (server log files) includes the type of web browser, the operating system used, the domain name of your Internet service provider, your IP address and similar.
privacy-policy.information-text-second: They are processed in particular for the following purposes:
privacy-policy.purpose-one: Ensuring problem-free connection to the website,
privacy-policy.purpose-two: Ensuring smooth use of our website,
privacy-policy.purpose-three: Evaluation of system security and stability as well
privacy-policy.data-use: We do not use your data to draw conclusions about you. Information of this kind may be anonymized by us for statistical evaluation in order to optimize our web presence and the underlying technology.
privacy-policy.legal-basis-and-legitimate-interest: The processing is carried out in accordance with Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR on the basis of our legitimate interest in improving the stability and functionality of our website.
privacy-policy.data-recipient: Recipients of the data may include technical service providers acting as processors for the operation and maintenance of our website.
privacy-policy.storage-duration: The data will be deleted as soon as it is no longer required for the purpose of its collection. This generally applies to the data needed for providing the website once the respective session has ended.
privacy-policy.provision-required: The provision of the aforementioned personal data is not legally or contractually required. However, without the IP address, the service and functionality of our website are not guaranteed. Moreover, individual services and services may be unavailable or restricted. For this reason, an objection is excluded.
privacy-policy.provision-of-paid-services: For the provision of paid services, we request additional data, such as payment details, to execute your order.
privacy-policy.legal-basis-processing: The processing of data required for the conclusion of the contract is based on Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR.
privacy-policy.recipient-second: Recipients of the data may include processors.
privacy-policy.storage-duration-content: We store this data in our systems until the statutory retention periods have expired. These are generally 6 or 10 years for reasons of proper bookkeeping and tax requirements.
privacy-policy.provision-required-content: The provision of your personal data is voluntary. Without the provision of your personal data, we cannot grant you access to our offered contents and services.
privacy-policy.type-and-purpose-content: The data you enter will be stored for the purpose of individual communication with you. For this, providing a valid email address and your name is required. This serves to assign the request and subsequently respond to it. The provision of further data is optional.
privacy-policy.legal-basis-content1: The processing of the data entered into the contact form is based on a legitimate interest (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR).
privacy-policy.legal-basis-content2: By providing the contact form, we want to enable easy communication with you. Your provided information will be stored for the purpose of processing the request and for possible follow-up questions.
privacy-policy.legal-basis-content3: If you contact us to request an offer, the processing of the data entered into the contact form will be carried out to perform pre-contractual measures (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR).
privacy-policy.recipient-content: The recipients of the data may be processors.
privacy-policy.storage-duration-content1: Data will be deleted no later than 6 months after processing the request.
privacy-policy.storage-duration-content2: If a contractual relationship is established, we are subject to the statutory retention periods according to the HGB (German Commercial Code) and will delete your data after these periods have expired.
privacy-policy.provision-required-content2: The provision of your personal data is voluntary. However, we can only process your request if you provide us with your name, your email address, and the reason for the request.
privacy-policy.ssl-encryption-content: To protect the security of your data during transmission, we use state-of-the-art encryption methods (e.g., SSL) via HTTPS.
privacy-policy.right-to-object-header: Information on Your Right to Object under Article 21 GDPR
privacy-policy.individual-right-to-object-content1: You have the right, for reasons arising from your particular situation, to object at any time to the processing of personal data concerning you which is based on Article 6(1)(f) GDPR (data processing based on a balance of interests); this also applies to profiling based on this provision within the meaning of Article 4(4) GDPR.
privacy-policy.individual-right-to-object-content2: If you object, we will no longer process your personal data unless we can demonstrate compelling legitimate grounds for the processing that outweigh your interests, rights, and freedoms, or the processing is for the establishment, exercise, or defense of legal claims.
privacy-policy.privacy-policy-changes-content: We reserve the right to adapt this privacy statement to always comply with the current legal requirements or to implement changes to our services in the privacy policy, e.g., when introducing new services. The new privacy policy will apply for your next visit.
